SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class CreationState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameState
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.CreationState
public class CreationState extends GameState
The CreationState class represents the game state during the creation phase, where players join and the game setup is done.

    • join

      public void join(String nickname, VirtualClient client) throws IllegalStateException
      Allows a player to join the game.
      Specified by:
      join in class GameState
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the joining player
      client - the virtual client of the joining player
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if players cannot join at this stage.

    • disconnect

      Handles player disconnection.
      Specified by:
      disconnect in class GameState
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the disconnecting player
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if disconnection cannot be handled at this stage.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided nickname is invalid

    • setNumOfPlayers

      public void setNumOfPlayers(String nickname, int num) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
      Sets the number of players for the game.
      Specified by:
      setNumOfPlayers in class GameState
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player initiating the action
      num - the number of players to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of players is invalid.
      IllegalStateException - if setting the number of players is not allowed at this stage.

    • placeStartingCard

      public void placeStartingCard(String nickname, boolean placeOnFront) throws IllegalStateException
      Throws an exception because placing a starting card is not allowed during the creation state.
      Specified by:
      placeStartingCard in class GameState
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player placing the card
      placeOnFront - true if the card should be placed on the front side, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - always, as this action is not allowed in this state.

    • draw

      public void draw(String nickname, char deckFrom, int cardPos) throws IllegalStateException
      Throws an exception because drawing is not allowed during the creation state.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player drawing the card
      deckFrom - the deck from which the card is drawn
      cardPos - the position on the card

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String nickname, String cardID, GamePoint cardPos, CornerDirection cornerDir, boolean placeOnFront) throws IllegalStateException
      Throws an exception because placing a card is not allowed during the creation state.
      Specified by:
      placeCard in class GameState
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player placing the card
      cardID - the ID of the card to place
      cardPos - the position on the game board where the card will be placed
      cornerDir - the direction in which to place the card's corner
      placeOnFront - true if the card should be placed on the front side, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - always, as this action is not allowed in this state.

    • restartGame

      public void restartGame(String nickname, int numOfPlayers) throws IllegalStateException
      Throws an exception because restarting the game is not allowed during the creation state.
      Specified by:
      restartGame in class GameState
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player initiating the restart
      numOfPlayers - the number of players for the restarted game
